accessibility.purpose: This chart presents the count by quarter.

name: Emphasis

accessibility.contextExplanation: This example of a bar chart was selected through example list on the sidebar.
accessibility.structureNotes: Quarter 4's bar is visually emphasized as the only quarter which is above market.
accessibility.purpose: This chart presents the count by quarter and highlights Q4 as it is the only quarter above market.

subTitle: Count of widgets by quarter for the year.

accessibility.contextExplanation: This example of a bar chart was selected through example list on the sidebar.
accessibility.structureNotes: A focused bar or hovered bar changes is highlighted by an added dashed border. A clicked bar has a solid border added when clicked, and will stay until clicked again, even if it is hovered.
accessibility.purpose: This chart presents the count by month to view the trend in count over the year.

accessibility.longDescription: This is a chart template that was made to showcase some of the capabilities of Visa Chart Components
accessibility.contextExplanation: This chart's initial view was determined by selecting the Color By Value recipe card. The props used by this chart may be changed using the props controls below.
accessibility.structureNotes: All bars are a shade of blue, but the intensity of the hue scales according to how high the value for that bar is.
accessibility.purpose: The purpose of this chart template is to provide an example of what props are required for using a color scheme that scales with values in a bar chart.
accessibility.statisticalNotes: This chart is using dummy data.

accessibility.contextExplanation: This example of a bar chart was selected through example list on the sidebar.
accessibility.structureNotes: The chart is laid out horizontally and each bar is colored according to the geographic region the country belongs to. Hovering, focusing, clicking, or selecting a bar will visually emphasize the other bars in that region.
accessibility.purpose: This chart presents the amount by country and groups countries within the same region.

referenceLines.label: Average
referenceLines.accessibilityDescription: Average value across countries and regions is 57

accessibility.purpose: Line chart showing the trend of amount by month for 2017.
accessibility.structureNotes: The line chart encodes amount by month allows for comparison to an average reference line at 8.2b. Actuals are compared to predication for the most recent month of December.
accessibility.statisticalNotes: This chart is using dummy data. The trend line is compared to average amount for the year, which, is approximately 8.2b.

accessibility.longDescription: This is a chart template that was made to showcase some of the capabilities of Visa Chart Components.
accessibility.contextExplanation: This chart's initial view was determined by selecting the Trend recipe card. The props used by this chart may be changed using the props controls below.
accessibility.purpose: The purpose of this chart template is to provide an example of how you might use a clustered bar chart to see trends across 4 groups over time.
accessibility.structureNotes: The bar clusters are sorted chronologically by month, and the color of each bar communicates what group that bar belongs to.
accessibility.statisticalNotes: This chart is using dummy data
